It looks like the teh file that is named Part 2 actually contains the ISO for Part 1, so it looks like part 2 is missing.

The game works. Just install it on PowerIso (Youtube if you need a registered account). Then, once you've installed the game. Click on the "explore" button on the right click menu on the virtual disc you have chosen. You should see a file called "crack". Open this, and copy the contents from this file into your DMC 4 Folder in "Program Files\CAPCOM" etc...

Ok guys you dont have to use powerISO, i used Daemon tools (lite) and it worked fine.

all you need to do is install the game, copy the INSIDE of the crack folder (the DX9 and the DX10) and replace the ones in the game folder (program files/CAPCOM etc) and then use the launcher

then the game will work fine :)
btw, you cant use the game straight from the DX10/9, you have to use the launcher, otherwise you will have a black screen and the game will crash

and dont alt+tab
otherwise the game will just screw up

Extract

Maybe you should try reinstalling. But as far as the torrent goes, this one is A OK.

USE DAEMON TOOLS LITE. After extracting both rar files, you should be getting a single iso. Now add new image using daemon tools. Then, in the daemon tools screen,CLICK ON ADD DT VIRTUAL DRIVE. Once the drive finishes installing, mount the iso to the new drive. This is what I did. Worked for me, i dont know why it shouldnt for you.
